feed.title: NVL-Lab
feed.subtitle: We use neuroprosthetics to study the brain and apply what we learn to improve neuroprosthetics.

entry.title: So it begins!
entry.content: include feature.html image="meme-so_it_begins.jpg" The website is up and running, the content is almost there. This is starting!!! Exciting!
